metadata.answer:
plt.subplot(211)
arima_results.plot_predict(start=1, end=100)
plt.title('ARIMA Model Predictions')
plt.subplot(212)
arima_results.plot_diagnostics()
plt.title('ARIMA Model Diagnostics')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
